c74object.name: o.autorange
c74object.digest: Get minimum and maximum values from an input number stream
c74object.description: o.autorange can constantly adapt to input numbers, which can be quite useful when we don't know the input's range.

objarg.name: minimum
objarg.description: Set minimum value and output range (minimum and maximum). If only one argument is present, it is used as both the minimum and maximum limit. If no argument is present, the minimum and maximum limit is 0. Introducing int and float values is the same since the output will always be float.

objarg.name: maximum
objarg.description: Set maximum value and output range (minimum and maximum). If only one argument is present, it is used as both the minimum and maximum limit. If no argument is present, the minimum and maximum limit is 0. Introducing int and float values is the same since the output will always be float.

method.name: int/float/list
method.description: Calculated the minimum and maximum values from input numbers. The range constantly adapted.

method.name: clear
method.description: Resets the stored and calculated contents of the object to zero whiles trigerring the outlets.

attribute.name: outmode
attribute.description: 0 (default) - outputs min and max in each outlet; 1 - outputs min and max list through the left outlet.

entry.name: float
entry.description:
Out left outlet: Minimum value.
Out right outlet: Maximum value.
